lisa_overo_link_arch.h

00001 #ifndef LISA_OVERO_LINK_ARCH_H
00002 #define LISA_OVERO_LINK_ARCH_H
00003 
00004 #include <stm32/spi.h>
00005 
00006 
00007 #define OveroLinkEvent(_data_received_handler, _crc_failed_handler) { \
00008     if (overo_link.status == DATA_AVAILABLE) {        /* set by DMA interrupt */ \
00009       while(SPI_I2S_GetFlagStatus(SPI1, SPI_I2S_FLAG_RXNE)==RESET); \
00010       while(SPI_I2S_GetFlagStatus(SPI1, SPI_I2S_FLAG_TXE) ==RESET); \
00011       while(SPI_I2S_GetFlagStatus(SPI1, SPI_I2S_FLAG_BSY) ==SET); \
00012       overo_link.timeout_cnt = 0;         \
00013       if((SPI_I2S_GetFlagStatus(SPI1, SPI_FLAG_CRCERR)) == RESET) { \
00014   LED_ON(OVERO_LINK_LED_OK);          \
00015   LED_OFF(OVERO_LINK_LED_KO);         \
00016   overo_link.msg_cnt++;           \
00017   _data_received_handler();         \
00018   overo_link_arch_prepare_next_transfert();     \
00019       }                 \
00020       else {                \
00021   SPI_Cmd(SPI1, DISABLE);           \
00022   LED_OFF(OVERO_LINK_LED_OK);         \
00023   LED_ON(OVERO_LINK_LED_KO);          \
00024   overo_link.crc_err_cnt++;         \
00025   overo_link.crc_error = TRUE;          \
00026   _crc_failed_handler();            \
00027       }                 \
00028       overo_link.status = IDLE;           \
00029     }                 \
00030     if (overo_link.crc_error &&                      /* if we've had a bad crc         */ \
00031   !GPIO_ReadInputDataBit(GPIOA, GPIO_Pin_4)) { /* and we're not selected anymore */ \
00032       overo_link_arch_prepare_next_transfert();       \
00033       overo_link.crc_error = FALSE;         \
00034     }                 \
00035     if (overo_link.timeout &&                      /* if we've had a timeout         */ \
00036   !GPIO_ReadInputDataBit(GPIOA, GPIO_Pin_4)) { /* and we're not selected anymore */ \
00037       overo_link_arch_prepare_next_transfert();       \
00038       overo_link.timeout = FALSE;         \
00039     }                 \
00040   }
00041 
00042 
00043 
00044 
00045 #endif /* LISA_OVERO_LINK_ARCH_H */
